item.title: Make Money with AI Content Marketing
item.description: Overview This post outlines a strategy for making money online by using AI tools to easily create marketing content and sales funnels. The key tools discussed are ChatGPT and FunnelsForever. Steps Find a software subscription service you can promote as an affiliate. Sign up to become an affiliate partner.
